short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces boring grey and red dots for overdue tickets with smelly piles of poo (or any other UTF-8 character of your choice).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

* Configurable ticket smell indicator (arbitrary unicode character or string)

This add-on enhances the experience of Jira Agile Board users. It does neither collect nor process any user data.
